text: Va ʙa tavri ciddi ʙa Alloh qasam xurdand, ki Alloh murdaro ruzi qijomat az nav zinda namekunad, ammo Alloh in qasamhoi onhoro duruƣ ʙarovarda megujad: Ore, in va'daest (ja'ne duʙora zinda kardani Alloh murdagonro), ki ʙesuʙha, ancom dodani on ʙar uhdai Ust, vale ʙestari mardum az saʙaʙi cahlason namedonand va muxolifati pajomʙaron karda ducori kufr mesavand
